Desc.entry: Mr A Baber tutors in computers for adults, beginners to advanced level, includes word processing, web page design and databases. Email for home and business, web browsing and safety. Internet marketing, pay per click advertising, buying a domain name. Pictures and video digital photography. Making back-ups of your work. Computer networks - wired and wireless. Network security methods. Computers - XP or Vista. For businesses - how to get your website in the top ten search results and how to optimise websites for sales. Will travel to students' homes in all areas of Sheffield, Doncaster, Barnsley and Rotherham.
